alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Grenada; Montgomery; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 10:36PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Choctaw, northeastern Holmes, Carroll, southeastern Grenada, southeastern Leflore, Webster and Montgomery Counties through 1115 PM CST... At 1036 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Winona, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Winona around 1040 PM CST. Kilmichael around 1050 PM CST. Lodi around 1055 PM CST. Eupora around 1105 PM CST. Mathiston around 1115 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Walthall and Carrollton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for central, north central and northeastern Mississippi.
